title: ITC Berranger Hand
content:
Hi all,

Just wondering if anyone can suggest a good free replacement for ITC Berranger Hand?

This will mostly be for web use and will likely only be used for one or two tag lines, so the quality doesn’t have to be perfect. I love the character of Berranger Hand , and I’m having trouble finding something that has a similar feel to it.

Thanks in advance!
author: khayden

comments.content:
Have a look at dafont.com there is a large selection of handwritten fonts of variable quality, or write it yourself and scan it since it’s only for limited use, you will get a far more convincing handwritten style.  
Tim

[FF Erikrighthand](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.735.3.7)  
 [Handsome Nib](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=NS.112085.0.4)  
 [Limehouse Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.735.3.7)  
 [FF Market](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.10462.0.0)  
 [FF Ropsen Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11237.0.0)  
 [Notec](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=LH.116773.0.1)  
 [Felt Tip Woman](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MSF.118746.0.0) and [Senior](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MSF.118745.0.0)

Overused but classic:  
 [Mistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=LH.116773.0.1)  
 [Felt Tip Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128120952/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MSF.100804.0.0)
